mapper.insert: insert into gxgroup (gno, ghost, gtitle, gloc, gintro, gday, gmax, gmin, gdate, gtag, gimg, goption) values (gxgroup_seq.nextval, #{ghost}, #{gtitle}, #{gloc}, #{gintro}, to_date(#{gdate},'yyyy-mm-dd-hh24-mi'), #{gmax}, #{gmin}, sysdate, #{gtag}, #{gimg}, #{goption})
mapper.update: update gxgroup set gsum = #{gsum} where gno = #{gno}
mapper.select: select gno, nick, gloc, gtitle, gstatus, gimg, goption from member,gxgroup where ghost = id and gstatus != '모임종료' order by gday
select gsum, gmin, gmax from gxgroup where gno = #{gno}
select gno, nick, gloc, gtitle, gstatus, gimg from member,gxgroup where ghost = id and gstatus != '모임종료' and replace(gtitle, ' ', '') like #{keyword} and gday like #{gday} order by ${order}
select gno, nick, gloc, gtitle, gstatus, gimg from member,gxgroup where ghost = id and gstatus != '모임종료' order by ${value}
select gno, nick, gloc, gtitle, gstatus, gimg from member,gxgroup where ghost = id and gstatus != '모임종료' and replace(gtitle, ' ', '') like #{keyword} order by ${order}
select gno, nick, gloc, gtitle, gstatus, gimg from member,gxgroup where ghost = id and gstatus != '모임종료' and gday like #{gday} order by gdate

select gno, ghost, gtitle, gloc, gintro, gday, gmax, gmin, gimg, gdate, gtag, gstatus, gsum from gxgroup natural join participant where pid=#{id} and gstatus = '모임종료' and position is null order by gday

select gno, ghost, gtitle, gloc, gintro, gday, gmax, gmin, gimg, gdate, gtag, gstatus, gsum from gxgroup natural join participant where pid=#{id} and gstatus != '모임종료' and position is null order by gday
select count(gno) from gxgroup natural join participant where pid=#{id}

select gno, ghost, gtitle, gloc, gintro, gday, gmax, gmin, gimg, gdate, gtag, gstatus, gsum from gxgroup where ghost=#{id} and gstatus = '모임종료' order by gday
select count(gno) from gxgroup where ghost=#{id}
